Part 3:

```{r setup 2,echo=FALSE, include = TRUE, warning = FALSE}

## a)

X <- seq(1,20, by = 2)
X <- 2*X
X

## b)

Y <- c(rep(0,20))
Y

## c)
integrand <- function(t)sqrt(t)
for (k in 1:20){ 
  if (k < 12){
    Y[k] <- cos(3*k)
    } else if (k >= 12){
        Y[k] <- integrate(integrand, lower = 0, upper = k) 
    }
}
Y

```
